top_categories.workout_context: 50ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne's Belgian Ardennes, European gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 50 miles.
At Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne. Train it until it feels boring.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before April.
Varied gradients on belgian Ardennes gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
When someone attacks on belgian Ardennes gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
50 miles on belgian Ardennes gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Torque for headwinds and belgian Ardennes gravel. When cadence drops below 70rpm, muscular strength keeps the watts up.
2-minute all-out efforts on belgian Ardennes gravel. Closing gaps, responding to attacks, sprinting for position. Train the burn.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne’s 50 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Dusty Gravel Series - Andenne requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on belgian ardennes gravel to build confidence. Expect: belgian ardennes, european gravel, belgium.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Over Under to prepare you for 50 miles of belgian ardennes gravel in Andenne, Belgium.
